Text: This is my first torrent. I'll try to seed for as long as possible during the day, but I must shut off the PC during the night.
does this version work any better than the others? Can you actually play it or do you become a pro at building a character to then watch it blow up in your face?

This should work fine. It took me forever to find a working Vista-Fix and other components that would ensure proper operation. The only slight bug I find with it is that after loading a game or watching a cut-scene it may go to a black screen but you'll still get audio. I haven't yet figured out a fix for this but it goes away by simply pressing CTRL+ALT+DEL and then just hitting "cancel" or going back into the game.
